name: OodleOodler
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oodle
des:
You can noodle anybody with this kid-friendly skill!

You can also oodle US states, animals, and superheroes. Alexa will happily respond with the oodled version of the name. For example, John Smith would be "Joodlehn Smoodleth." It's hilarious to hear what she comes up with!

Entertain for hours! Good fun for all ages.

If you don't want to come up with a name yourself, simply ask Alexa to oodle a random superhero.

After you say 'Alexa, open oodle,' you will be asked 'who should I oodle?' You can respond with phrases such as these:

Ralph
John George Smith
the animal bear
the state of Washington
a random superhero

Have fun!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
